SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : SET &UC4RB_YAML_DATA# = "" : SET &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS# = "" : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &SEARCH_START_STR# = "UC4RB_YAML_DATA::=" : SET &SEARCH_END_STR# = "UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS" : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP") : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 2 : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&VALUE#,"::=") : IF &STRINGS#[1] EQ "UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS" : SET &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS# = &STRINGS#[2] : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# EQ 0 : SET &FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, &SEARCH_START_STR#) : ELSE : SET &READ_END_FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, &SEARCH_END_STR#) : IF &READ_END_FLAG# NE 0 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &UC4RB_YAML_DATA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_DATA#,"&VALUE#&NL#") : SET &UC4RB_YAML_DATA# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_YAML_DATA#) : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_YAML_CONTENT# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_TMP_FILE :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_YAML_DATA#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS#,,"WORKFLOW"
